channel.title: Software on Entwine Centre
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Entwine Centre

item.title: WebAssembly and IoT
item.description: WebAssembly and IoT According to a recent survey commissioned by the Linux Foundation, IoT applications were the third most popular “use case” for WebAssembly (behind the web and data visualisation).

item.title: RIoT OS Anniversary
item.description: 10th Anniversary of RIoT OS The RIoT OS is one of the many choices of operating system available for the kinds of embedded processors used in IoT devices.
